#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
long long int gcd(long long int x,long long int y)
{
	if(y==0)
	return x;
	if(x==0)
	return y;
	if(x==y)
	return x;
	else
	return gcd(y,x%y);
}
int main()
{
	long long int n,t,a,b,temp;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld",&a,&b);
		if(a==b)
		printf("0\n");
		else
		{
			n=gcd(a,b);
			a/=n;
			b/=n;
		     if(a<b)
		     {
		     	temp=a;
		     	a=b;
		     	b=temp;
		     }
		     if(a%b)
		     {
		     	printf("%lld\n",a-2);
		     }
		     else
		     {
		     	printf("%lld\n",a/b-2);
		     }
		}
	}
}
